amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike Title XIV which creates a 100-mile operation control zone for the Department of Homeland Security along the northern and southern borders of the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed House Report 112-539 to strike Title XIV which creates a 100-mile operation control zone for the Department of Homeland Security along the northern and southern borders of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grijalva amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 247 (Roll no. 385).
